docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Maternity Leave? It's More Like a Pause'' (Sunday Styles, July 22). Much has been made of Marissa Mayer's comments that she will work through her short maternity leave. Sadly, much of it has been criticism from all ends: that she's putting work before family, that she is doing a disservice to women who do take time off or that she's naïve to think that postpartum will be that easy. But clearly, she is a very smart and talented woman who is capable of making the choices that are best for her own life, and that's nobody else's business.
